subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Giants outscored the Reds, 16-8, after losing the first two in their division series, and outscored the Cardinals, 11-1, after falling behind, three games to one, in the N.L.C.S.
snippet: The Giants outscored the Reds, 16-8, after losing the first two in their division series, and outscored the Cardinals, 11-1, after falling behind, three games to one, in the N.L.C.S.
